nodes.text: Sor Venge was a Human male Inquisitor. Around the time of the Battle of Yavin, he led a contingent of stormtroopers during the search for a group of Force-sensitives and a Holocron at the Well of Shadows.
He wore dark robes and wielded a crimson lightsaber.
Sor Venge appears in the introductory story for Fantasy Flight Games' 2016 roleplaying game book Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook.
